title: How do I change the Encryption mode of  my  wireless Router?
answer: The Router supports many configurations for Wi-Fi security. We do not recommend that you change your Router’s security settings. If you want to make modifications, log in to the Router Management Interface, go to Advanced Settings—〉WLAN Settings—〉WLAN Advanced Settings. Here you will also see a brief guide to the security configurations available for the Router and other options for changing the settings.
